title: asset.issue@1.0.0
description: Payload describing the issuance of a fungible or non-fungible asset.

assetId.description: Stable identifier for the asset being issued.

owner.description: DID or address of the receiving owner.

amount.description: Quantity issued, represented as a string to avoid precision loss.

divisible.description: Indicates whether fractional amounts are permitted.

vestingSchedule.description: Optional vesting schedule keyed by unlock timestamp.

^\\d+$.description: Quantity that unlocks at the associated timestamp.

metadata.description: Unstructured metadata for the issued asset.
